title: Child fatally shot in Coward by another child
content:
COWARD, S.C. – A 12-year-old child was shot fatally by another child Tuesday and another child was injured in the incident, according to Florence County Coroner Keith von Lutcken.
The incident appears to be an accident, von Lutcken said in a news release.
The incident is being investigated by the Florence County Sheriff’s Office and Coroner’s Office.
The fatal shooting occurred at approximately 4:50 p.m. at a residence located at 4312 Circle Drive in Coward.
The child who was injured was taken to a local hospital and is in stable condition, according to von Lutcken.
The name of the child who was killed is being withheld and will be released today or Thursday, the release by von Lutcken indicated.
An autopsy will be conducted Thursday morning at the Medical University of South Carolina in Charleston.
